content: While Chen Loong is highly susceptible to being staggered, he has a few tricks to stop you from pressing the attack for too long. His tail can be pretty impressive, and will use it to spin around and attack with it for two rotations, and then leap into the air to perform a delayed third electric slash.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Chen Loong'.
The content is as follows:
While Chen Loong is highly susceptible to being staggered, he has a few tricks to stop you from pressing the attack for too long. His tail can be pretty impressive, and will use it to spin around and attack with it for two rotations, and then leap into the air to perform a delayed third electric slash.
